login.min: Login must be at least {min} characters long!
login.max: Login can be at most {max} characters long!

password.min: Password must be at least {min} characters long!
password.max: Password can be at most {max} characters long!
password.alpha: Password must contain at least one letter!

password.char: Password must contain at least one special character!
